name: getRandomRecipes
description: Find random (popular) recipes. If you need to filter recipes by diet, nutrition etc. you might want to consider using the complex recipe search endpoint and set the sort request parameter to random.

limitLicense.description: Whether the recipes should have an open license that allows display with proper attribution.

tags.description: The tags (can be diets, meal types, cuisines, or intolerances) that the recipe must have.

number.description: The maximum number of items to return (between 1 and 100). Defaults to 10.
